title: Live in the Heart of Napa Valley in This 1BR/1BA Home!
posting_body: ['Canyon Ridge at Napa Junction', 'Address:', '800 Reliant Way American Canyon, CA 94503', '11A  1 \xa0bed / 1 bath / 798 Sq.', 'Ft / $2,816 - $3,072', '* Unit 624 - Available', 'Now', '* Unit 621 - Available 08/18/22', '* Unit 212 - Available 08/27/22', 'Find the perfect home at Canyon Ridge.', 'Indulge in comfort and style at Canyon Ridge.', 'Nestled in the heart of Napa Valley lies this immaculate one-bedroom, one-bathroom apartment from Canyon Ridge!', 'Step inside this home and witness its expansive layout accented with stylish wood-style flooring and designer finishes!', 'The open concept, gourmet-style kitchen features beautiful quartz countertops and attractive appliances.', 'The bathrooms come complete with spa-like, roman-style soaking tubs!', 'The spacious walk-in closet is perfect for storing all of your favorite outfits and belongings!', 'With the included full-size washer and dryer, taking care of laundry is easy and convenient.', 'Residents living at Canyon Ridge gain access to a multitude of community amenities, including a resort-style heated saltwater pool, a bocce ball court, and a yoga studio.', 'Call the Canyon Ridge leasing staff to learn more.', 'Floor Plan/Unit Amenities:', '* Masted Bedroom Walk In Closet', '* XL Direct Entry Garage', '* Designer Finishes', '* Stainless steel appliances', '* Washer Dryer', '* Upgraded Plank
